title: Facebook-Based Informal Science Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Platform Utilization Skills and Advanced Expertise in Scientific Fields
context.additional_context: A microlearning environment where professionals informally learn immediately applicable scientific knowledge via Facebook communities

learning_goals: Learners create and manage three or more real-time science discussion threads using Facebook group features
Learners engage in proactive interactions, such as writing knowledge-sharing posts with peer experts twice weekly in mobile environments
Learners identify two or more time management/cultural conflict issues in Facebook-based learning and develop resolution strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
